name: Diamond Crush Blast - Lost Treasure Quest
name_original: Diamond Crush Blast - Lost Treasure Quest
description:
The highest score so far 5767 points!! can you beat that
Tap the diamonds with the same color to blast them away, don’t let the diamonds reach the top of the pyramid!
See how long can you survive before you ran out of moves, the more you survive the harder the game gets, more diamonds and more challenges
